data.title: What is Kissflow?
data.meta_description: This article will discuss Kissflow, its features, advantages, and pricing structure.
data.text:
Businesses are getting complex with every passing day, and it has become very difficult to manually manage all the business needs on paper.

That is why a lot of business name management tools and platforms are being made. These bring a lot of ease to the business management process; at the same time, they make things efficient for the business management.

Kissflow is one of them, and here we will be discussing it.

Kissflow Overview

Kissflow is a business process and workflow management software that works on cloud technology.

It means that you do not have to manage hardware to get these services. Moreover, it helps businesses to do a lot of automation to their business processes with its smart features.

One of the main reasons for using Kissflow is that it is designed in a way that helps non-technical people. By using Kissflow, these people can meet all the technical requirements of their business process without any major issues.

Kissflow Core Features

Kissflow comes with a lot of features that collectively make things easier for the users. Here we will be elaborating on some of them.

Process Engine features

The first and the most important feature that you get from Kissflow is that it helps manage the processes related to the business.

Here you get many things like the process designer, from the builder, model execution, and even SQA support, which make sure that your processes are being dealt with in the best manner.

Report and analytics

Kissflow comes with comprehensive dashboards along with custom reports and standard reports features, which ensure maximum productivity for your business.

Additional features

When it comes to the features you get from Kissflow, there are a lot of little things that bring the most value for the users. Here are some of those additional core features that you get here.

Workflow process tracking

Google apps support

Office 365 support

Native Android and iOS applications for the best performance and experience

Zapier integration.

Master data management and a lot more

Kissflow Advantages

Using Kissflow comes with a lot of advantages. One of the best advantages here is that it makes the whole process very easy for people who have no very low knowledge of working with the software.

However, there are a lot of other advantages that you can experience from using its services. So, here we will be discussing some of the advantages of using Kissflow.

Kissflow is easy to set up and simple to use.

The templates make work even easier.

Application-based notifications bring a lot of value by notifying users most appropriately.

The testing and decision-making process gets digital, which saves a lot of time and workforce.

Kissflow Pricing

When it comes to the pricing for Kissflow services, there are different prices for different products. Here we will be mentioning the packages for each of the products.

Workflow management

The workflow management services from Kissflow come with a lot of benefits and features, making things digital and automated at your end. Here is what you have to pay for these services.

The basic package costs $16 per user per month.

The advanced package costs $22 per user per month.

A fully loaded package costs $30 per user per month.

Case management

If you are looking to put your users in control in an efficient case management environment, then Kissflow will charge as follows:

The basic package costs $16 per user per month.

The advanced package costs $22 per user per month.

A fully loaded package costs $30 per user per month.

Project management

If you are looking for the pricing for specific needs for your project, then here is what you will have to pay.

There is a free package.

The starter package costs $45 per month.

There is a professional package costing $75 per month.

If you think that any of these packages do not fulfill your needs properly, you can get the enterprise package upon contacting the team.

Collaboration

Collaboration services bring a lot of productivity to your business environment as employees can work together. So, here is what you have to pay for these services.

The basic package costs $20 per user per month.

The advanced package costs $25 per user per month.

A fully loaded package costs $40 per user per month.

This was all about the prices of Kissflow for some of its services.

Conclusion

In this era of innovation where going digital has become necessary for every business, platforms like Kissflow provide their best services to assist the businesses. Here we were discussing everything that you needed to know about Kissflow.

FAQ

What is Kissflow?

Kissflow is a business process and workflow management software that works on cloud technology.

What are the core features of Kissflow?

– Workflow management

– Process management

– Project management

– Procurement cloud
